category-desc:
'Our rugs lie lightly on this earth'
The beautiful designed rugs of Armadillo & Co are 100% handmade, sustainable, fair-trade and infused with the rich history of the hands who have created them.

products.name: Berber Knot Atlas Rug
products.description:
The Atlas Weave Rug from Armadillo&Co features a simple large diamond pattern. Taking cues from traditional Moroccan Beni Ourain rugs with large scale patterning and a low pile. The Atlas Rug is hand knotted in pure wool in soft, natural tones. The Atlas Weave Rug sits perfectly atop light or warm floorboards, bringing character to the space without dominating. With 3 different sizes and 2 colours available this rug can be used in a variety of ways. The larger sizes are great for a living room or open plan spaces. The 170 x 240 cm rug is great for smaller spaces like a study, den or styled next to a bed.

Material: pure wool and cotton

Shipping: 3 to 4 weeks. We ship within Europe, please contact us for a shipping quote.

products.name: Berber Knot Savannah Rug
products.description:
This Berber knot Savannah Rug from Armadillo&Co reflects the landscapes of its namesake, conjuring up images of the grass swaying in the breeze. The Savannah Rug is sumptuously soft underfoot, with the design etched into the pile, resulting in an invitingly tactile mix of high and low pile. We love styling the Savannah Rug on bare boards, inviting you to feel its texture and lush depth. With 3 different sizes available this rug can be used in a variety of ways. Use the larger sizes in the bedroom and treat your feet as soon as you hop out of bed. The 1.7 x 2.4m Savannah Weave Rug will also create a cosy corner in your living room or study.

Material: pure wool and cotton

Shipping: 3 to 4 weeks. We ship this product within Europe, please contact us for a shipping quote.
